title: Fungus plants
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: Emphasis is given to the various mushrooms whose growth and reproduction are illustrated by time-lapse photography and animation. Moulds and other fungi are also presented by these same techniques. Their economic importance is indicated.
